mapper.sql: from ( select HCAI.CASE_ACT_ID_ as ID_ , count( CASE WHEN HCAI.STATE_ = 1 THEN 1 ELSE null END ) as AVAILABLE_ , count( CASE WHEN HCAI.STATE_ = 2 THEN 1 ELSE null END ) as ENABLED_ , count( CASE WHEN HCAI.STATE_ = 3 THEN 1 ELSE null END ) as DISABLED_ , count( CASE WHEN HCAI.STATE_ = 4 THEN 1 ELSE null END ) as ACTIVE_ , count( CASE WHEN HCAI.STATE_ = 6 THEN 1 ELSE null END ) as TERMINATED_ , count( CASE WHEN HCAI.STATE_ = 7 THEN 1 ELSE null END ) as COMPLETED_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_CASEACTINST HCAI where HCAI.CASE_DEF_ID_ = #{caseDefinitionId} group by HCAI.CASE_ACT_ID_ ) RES
